bodytemplates.contents:
Click the link you see in the email. This is a one-off.
Cliquez le lien qui se trouve dans le courriel. C'est une fois pour toutes.
{DESCRIPTION}. You have to do this only once.
{BLANK}
Spam Arrest - Take control of your inbox!
------------------------------------------------------------ You are receiving this message in response to your email to {TO_EMAIL}, a Spam Arrest customer.
Spam Arrest requests that senders verify themselves before their email is delivered.
When you click the above link, you will be taken to a page with a graphic on it. Simply read the word in the graphic, type it into the form, accept the Sender Agreement, and you're verified.
You have to do this only once per Spam Arrest customer. ------------------------------------------------------------ Below are the complete headers of the message that this email was generated in response to.
{ORIG_MESSAGE}

--- The following addresses had delivery problems ---
<{TO_EMAIL}> ({DESCRIPTION})

A message (from <{FROM_EMAIL}>) was received at {RECEIVED_DATETIME}.
The following addresses had delivery problems:
<repeat> <{TO_EMAIL}> Permanent Failure: {DESCRIPTION} Delivery last attempted at {DELIVERY_ATTEMPT_DATETIME} </repeat>
<repeat> Failed to deliver to '{TO_EMAIL}' SMTP module(domain {TO_DOMAIN}) reports: {DESCRIPTION} </repeat>
<repeat> Failed to deliver to '{TO_EMAIL}' SMTP module(domain {TO_DOMAIN}) reports: host {TO_HOST} says: {DESCRIPTION} </repeat>
<repeat> Failed to deliver to '{TO_EMAIL}' SMTP module(domain {TO_DOMAIN}) reports: return-path address <{FROM_EMAIL}> rejected by {TO_HOST}: {DESCRIPTION} </repeat>
Failed to deliver to '{TO_EMAIL}' mail loop: {DESCRIPTION}

MailEnable: Message could not be delivered to some recipients. The following recipient(s) could not be reached:
<repeat> Recipient: [SMTP:{TO_EMAIL}] Reason: {DESCRIPTION} </repeat>
Message headers follow:
{ORIG_MESSAGE}

The attached message had PERMANENT fatal delivery errors!
After one or more unsuccessful delivery attempts the attached message has been removed from the mail queue on this server. The number and frequency of delivery attempts are determined by local configuration parameters.
YOUR MESSAGE WAS NOT DELIVERED TO ONE OR MORE RECIPIENTS!
--- Session Transcript --- {BLANK}: Parsing Message <{BLANK}> {BLANK}: From: {FROM_EMAIL} {BLANK}: To: {TO_EMAIL} {BLANK}: Subject: {SUBJECT} {BLANK}: Message-ID: <{REFERENCE_CODE}> {DESCRIPTION} --- End Transcript --- : Message contains [1] file attachments

The attached message had PERMANENT fatal delivery errors!
After one or more unsuccessful delivery attempts the attached message has been removed from the mail queue on this server. The number and frequency of delivery attempts are determined by local configuration parameters.
YOUR MESSAGE WAS NOT DELIVERED TO ONE OR MORE RECIPIENTS!
The following addresses did NOT receive a copy of your message:
<repeat> > {TO_EMAIL} </repeat>
--- Session Transcript --- {DESCRIPTION} --- End Transcript --- : Message contains [1] file attachments

The attached message had PERMANENT fatal delivery errors!
After one or more unsuccessful delivery attempts the attached message has been removed from the mail queue on this server. The number and frequency of delivery attempts are determined by local configuration parameters.
YOUR MESSAGE WAS NOT DELIVERED TO ONE OR MORE RECIPIENTS!
Failed address: {TO_EMAIL}
--- Session Transcript --- {DESCRIPTION} --- End Transcript --- : Message contains [1] file attachments

The original message was received at {RECEIVED_DATETIME} from {FROM_HOST} [{FROM_IP}] ----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors ----- <{TO_EMAIL}> (reason: {REASON}) ----- Transcript of session follows ----- {DESCRIPTION}

The original message was received at {RECEIVED_DATETIME} from [{FROM_IP}]
*** ATTENTION ***
Your e-mail is being returned to you because there was a problem with its delivery. The address which was undeliverable is listed in the section labeled: "----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors -----".
The reason your mail is being returned to you is listed in the section labeled: "----- Transcript of Session Follows -----".
The line beginning with "<<<" describes the specific reason your e-mail could not be delivered. The next line contains a second error message which is a general translation for other e-mail servers.
Please direct further questions regarding this message to your e-mail administrator.
--{BLANK}
----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors ----- <{TO_EMAIL}>
----- Transcript of session follows ----- {DESCRIPTION}

The original message was received at {RECEIVED_DATETIME} from {FROM_HOST} [{FROM_IP}]
*** ATTENTION ***
Your e-mail is being returned to you because there was a problem with its delivery. The address which was undeliverable is listed in the section labeled: "----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors -----".
The reason your mail is being returned to you is listed in the section labeled: "----- Transcript of Session Follows -----".
The line beginning with "<<<" describes the specific reason your e-mail could not be delivered. The next line contains a second error message which is a general translation for other e-mail servers.
Please direct further questions regarding this message to your e-mail administrator.
--{BLANK}
----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors ----- <{TO_EMAIL}>
----- Transcript of session follows ----- {DESCRIPTION}

*** ATTENTION ***
Your e-mail is being returned to you because there was a problem with its delivery. The reason your mail is being returned to you is listed in the section labeled: "----- The delivery status notification errors -----".
The line beginning with "Diagnostic-Code:" describes the specific reason your e-mail could not be delivered. The following lines contains the RFC822 header of the original email message.
Please direct further questions regarding this message to your e-mail administrator.
--{BLANK}
----- The delivery status notification errors -----
<{TO_EMAIL}>: host {TO_HOST}[{TO_IP}] said: {DESCRIPTION}

This is a warning message only. Your message remains in the server queue, the server will try to send it again. You should not try to resend your message now.
Message delivery to '{TO_EMAIL}' delayed SMTP module(domain {TO_DOMAIN}) reports: {TO_HOST}: {DESCRIPTION}

This is a warning message only. Your message remains in the server queue, the server will try to send it again. You should not try to resend your message now.
Message delivery to '{TO_EMAIL}' delayed SMTP module(domain {TO_DOMAIN}) reports: message text rejected by {TO_HOST}: {DESCRIPTION}

This is the {MDS_NAME} program at host {TO_HOST}.
I'm sorry to have to inform you that your message could not be be delivered to one or more recipients. It's attached below.
For further assistance, please send mail to <{POSTMASTER}>
If you do so, please include this problem report. You can delete your own text from the attached returned message.
The {MDS_NAME} program
<{TO_EMAIL}>: {DESCRIPTION}

This is the {MDS_NAME} program at host {TO_HOST}.
I'm sorry to have to inform you that your message could not be be delivered to one or more recipients. It's attached below.
For further assistance, please send mail to <{POSTMASTER}>
If you do so, please include this problem report. You can delete your own text from the attached returned message.
The {MDS_NAME} program
<{TO_FORWARDEMAIL}> (expanded from <{TO_EMAIL}>): {DESCRIPTION}

This is the {MDS_NAME} program at host {TO_HOST}.
I'm sorry to have to inform you that the message returned below could not be delivered to one or more destinations.
For further assistance, please send mail to <{POSTMASTER}>
If you do so, please include this problem report. You can delete your own text from the message returned below.
The {MDS_NAME} program
<{TO_EMAIL}>: {DESCRIPTION}

{BLANK}This message was created automatically by mail delivery software.
A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. The following addresses failed:
<{TO_EMAIL}>
SMTP error from remote server after RCPT command: host {FROM_HOST}[{FROM_IP}]: {DESCRIPTION} ({TO_EMAIL})
--- The header of the original message is following. ---

{DESCRIPTION}
Your message was not delivered within {DAYS}. Host {TO_HOST} is not responding.
The following recipients did not receive this message:
<{TO_EMAIL}>
Please reply to {POSTMASTER} if you feel this message to be in error.

This is a delivery status notification from the Kabelsignal Mailsystem, running the Courier mail server, version {KERIO_NUM}.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
UNDELIVERABLE MAIL
Your message to the following recipients cannot be delivered:
<{TO_EMAIL}>: <<< {DESCRIPTION}.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
If your message was also sent to additional recipients, their delivery status is not included in this report. You may or may not receive other delivery status notifications for additional recipients.
The original message follows as a separate attachment.

This is the Postfix program at host {TO_HOST}.
I'm sorry to have to inform you that your message could not be delivered to one or more recipients. It's attached below.
For further assistance, please send mail to <postmaster>
If you do so, please include this problem report. You can delete your own text from the attached returned message.
